definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Simultaneous to this engagement, Scipio had all his trumpeters blow at once to startle the elephants.
sentences.chinese: 同时，西庇阿命令所有号手一起鸣号来惊吓战象。

definition: to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
pedestrian/traveler on foot/passer-by/official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor
to show consideration for (others)/to yield to (another vehicle etc)/courtesy/comity
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
